results.name: The characteristic function of the multiples of eight.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
mathematica: Table[Boole[IntegerQ[n/8]], {n, 0, 127}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 03 2015, after _Alonso del Arte_ at A121262 *)
Array[ Boole[ Mod[#, 8] == 0] &, 105, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 08 2017 *)
results.author: _Mikael Aaltonen_, Jan 03 2015
